title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Marketplace growth through product-led growth and international expansion
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过产品驱动增长和国际扩张实现 AWS Marketplace 增长
abstract: Discover how to accelerate your product-led growth (PLG) strategy and expand globally through AWS Marketplace. This session provides practical insights into optimizing digital customer acquisition, streamlining the buying experience, and localizing purchasing experiences. Learn to leverage AWS Marketplace capabilities to drive self-service subscriptions, shorten sales cycles, and obtain global operational fluidity. We'll cover best practices for listing optimization, pricing strategies, and key actionable insights to help with your international reach.
abstract_cn: 了解如何通过 AWS Marketplace 加速您的产品主导增长 (PLG) 策略并实现全球扩张。本课程提供有关优化数字客户获取、简化购买体验和本地化购买体验的实用见解。学习如何利用 AWS Marketplace 功能来推动自助订阅、缩短销售周期并获得全球运营流畅性。我们将介绍列表优化、定价策略的最佳实践，以及帮助您扩大国际影响力的关键可行见解。
